ebcf.title: "Early Bird" is such a platform that makes the buyers and sellers better cooperation
ebcf.text1:
Through the platform will be early payment program into both sides can benefit
the behavior.
ebcf.subtitle: EBCF makes it easier for You
ebcf.text2:
The buyer only needs to simply present the original payment plan
on the platform and the amount and time of the early payment, and the seller provides the
acceptable rate for the corresponding invoice for cash.
By the platform for everyone to calculate the income
and connection matching. It is so simple.
ebcf.collaborate-desc:
With our platform, buyer and seller
copoeration benefit the behavior.
ebcf.optimize-desc:
This platform calculate the income
and connection matching.

faq.title: Here’s a few answers to our most common questions
faq.answer1: It’s completely free to users, no matter for buyer or supplier.
faq.question2: Is it risky for working capital on EP-FO platform?
faq.answer2: It’s completely risk-free. On approved invoices, both sides of user don’t need to change any bank information.
faq.question3: Does buyer or supplier need to do any change on ERP/SAP ?
faq.subtitle: Power your cash flow with intelligent automation
faq.create-account: create your free own account now

dialog-participation.title: Participating Can Save Your Time & Money
dialog-participation.info3: in all current and future clearings.
dialog-participation.tip: You can turn OFF participation any time you want to quit clearing.

dialog-offer.title2: Keep it active through the upcoming market clear
dialog-offer.title3: Cancel this offer by turning participation off, otherwise it will be applied to all current and future invoices your customer loads into EBCF.
dialog-offer.tab2: If your offer is accepted, you will be paid the clearing amount net of discount
dialog-offer.tab3-title: Your customer will initiate payment on

markets.subtext: You have {{value}} of eligible invoices with {{market}} ({{currency}}). Set an offer to get paid early by an average of {{dpe}} days.
markets.waiting-status: Market status is waiting. You can not edit this field
markets.turn-on: Turn ON participation to enter the market

minimum-pay-amount-popup.minimum-invoice: You are choosing minimum invoice amount, it means you agree to clear every eligible invoice.
minimum-pay-amount-popup.fixed-inline: You are setting a fixed line amount at {{paymentValue}}, you can set the line according to your need. But be awared a higher fixed line may decrease your chance to win more early payment amount.

forget.title: Get help signing in to your account
forget.instructions: Please enter your email and we will send you a link with instructions to change your password.

forget-password-message.title: Check your email
forget-password-message.message: If we have an account on file linked to {{forgetmail}}, we have sent an email with instructions to reset your password. Please contact {{email}} for any additional questions.
